name: SeOnMoro
body:
# SeOnMoro
***

[SeOnMoro!](http://seonmoro.azurewebsites.net)

This SPA provides an mechanism for pulling last minute flight/holiday offers
from multiple Finnish travel agencies. The site has an interface for communicating 
with plethora of sites and last minute deals are gathered and shown to user in a 
smart, simple and accessible view.

After choosing a deal that You, the user likes, you'll be redirected onto the 
travel agency's site for the final booking process.

When, where, one or two weeks, how much? Book. Head for the sun.

* Ruby
* REST (XML, JSON)
* MongoDB
* Node.js
* jQuery Mobile
* HTML5, CSS3
* Lucene
* Twitter
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
